name: Ace Blackring in the Quest For Garlic Bread
name_original: Ace Blackring in the Quest For Garlic Bread
description:
TRAGEDY IN THE COASTLANDS!

Fire has devastated the garlic bread supply in Port Rowdy.  It is up to local fast travel network technician Ace Blackring to save the day!  Can you help Ace find more garlic bread before the pirates and the cowboys tear apart the Coastlands in hunger?

Go Hug A Cactus!

Explore the desert frontier of the Coastlands, a barren wasteland where prospectors and cowboys try to scratch a living from the dry soil.  Giddy-up, pardner!

Meet New Friends!

The Seaside Old West town of Port Rowdy is full of interesting characters, including the mysterious lady of the night in your apartment and the delightful Sheriff Manatee.  Everyone’s waiting to join your friendzone!

Tune Out The Sirens' Call!

Hit the high seas of adventure!  The waters off the Coastlands are full of pirates, treasure, and mythical monsters of the deep, like the great asexuwhale!  Ahoy there, matey!

-----------

Ace Blackring in the Quest for Garlic Bread is an asexual-themed graphical text adventure, inspired by games for the Commodore 64.  More backstory available here. 

It is currently still under development.  Only an early preview featuring some of the graphics (and one of the puzzles!) from the game is available at this time.

This game was made for Ace Jam 2023.

(Feelies not included.)
